title: Gaza starts to push back against Hamas
summary: Hundreds of people have taken to the streets of the Palestinian territory to demand an end to the war and the departure of Hamas. Israel, Fatah and Arab countries are seeking to keep the Islamist movement out of the post-war equation.

summary: The 80-year-old writer, who suffers from cancer, has been detained in Algeria since November 2024. The ruling comes amid a diplomatic crisis between Paris and Algiers.

summary: The US president has confirmed his intention to impose a surtax on cars imported into the US. 'Le Monde' columnist Philippe Escande sets out several of the truths history has established about increasing customs 'tariffs': they result in a drop in sales, are passed on to the consumer, and draw retaliatory measures on the part of the countries affected.
